44 
45 CollisionPair::CollisionPair(
46  const Species& s1, const Species& s2, const IO::XmlElement* xml) :
47  mp_xml(xml)
48 {
49  // First initialize species info
50  initSpeciesData(s1, s2);
51 }

53 //==============================================================================
54 
55 const string& CollisionPair::sp1Name() const {
56  return mp_sp1->groundStateName();
57 }
58 
59 //==============================================================================
60 
61 const string& CollisionPair::sp2Name() const {
62  return mp_sp2->groundStateName();
63 }
64 
65 //==============================================================================
66 
67 SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> CollisionPair::get(const string& type)
68 {
69  map<string, SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> >::iterator iter =
70  m_integrals.find(type);
71  if (iter != m_integrals.end())
72  return iter->second;
73 
74  return m_integrals.insert(
75  make_pair(type, loadIntegral(type))).first->second;
76 }
77 
78 //==============================================================================
79 
80 void CollisionPair::initSpeciesData(const Species& s1, const Species& s2)
81 {
82  string name1 = s1.groundStateName();
83  string name2 = s2.groundStateName();
84 
85  // Determine the type of collision
86  if (!s1.isIon()) { // first species is neutral
87  if (s2.type() == ELECTRON)
88  m_type = ELECTRON_NEUTRAL;
89  else if (s2.isIon())
90  m_type = ION_NEUTRAL;
91  else
92  m_type = NEUTRAL_NEUTRAL;
93  } else { // first species is an ion (electron or heavy)
94  if (s2.isIon()) {
95  if (s1.charge() * s2.charge() > 0)
96  m_type = REPULSIVE;
97  else
98  m_type = ATTRACTIVE;
99  } else if (s1.type() == ELECTRON)
100  m_type = ELECTRON_NEUTRAL;
101  else
102  m_type = ION_NEUTRAL;
103  }
104 
105  // Store species in order depending on their names (e- always first)
106  mp_sp1 = &s1;
107  mp_sp2 = &s2;
108 
109  if (sp1Name() > sp2Name())
110  std::swap(mp_sp1, mp_sp2);
111  if (sp2Name() == "e-")
112  std::swap(mp_sp1, mp_sp2);
113 
114  // Make the string representation of this pair
115  m_string = "(" + sp1Name() + "," + sp2Name() + ")";
116 }
117 
118 //==============================================================================
119 
120 IO::XmlElement::const_iterator CollisionPair::findPair() const
121 {
122  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator iter = mp_xml->findTag("pair");
123  string sp1, sp2;
124  while (iter != mp_xml->end()) {
125  iter->getAttribute("s1", sp1, "Collision pair missing sp1 attribute.");
126  iter->getAttribute("s2", sp2, "Collision pair missing sp2 attribute.");
127 
128  // Check if species names match
129  if ((sp1Name() == sp1 && sp2Name() == sp2) ||
130  (sp1Name() == sp2 && sp2Name() == sp1))
131  break;
132 
133  // Get next collision pair in the database
134  iter = mp_xml->findTag("pair", ++iter);
135  }
136 
137  return iter;
138 }
139 
140 //==============================================================================
141 
142 IO::XmlElement::const_iterator
143 CollisionPair::findXmlElementWithIntegralType(
144  const string& kind) const
145 {
146  // First check if this collision pair is explicitly given in the database
147  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator iter = findPair();
148 
149  // Found the pair, so check if the integral is explicitly given
150  if (iter != mp_xml->end()) {
151  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator Qiter = iter->findTag(kind);
152  if (Qiter != iter->end())
153  return Qiter;
154  }
155 
156  // Didn't find the pair or integral wasn't given, so look in defaults
157  iter = mp_xml->findTag("defaults");
158  if (iter == mp_xml->end()) return iter;
159 
160  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator pair;
161  switch (m_type) {
162  case NEUTRAL_NEUTRAL:
163  pair = iter->findTag("neutral-neutral"); break;
164  case ELECTRON_NEUTRAL:
165  pair = iter->findTag("electron-neutral"); break;
166  case ION_NEUTRAL:
167  pair = iter->findTag("ion-neutral"); break;
168  default:
169  pair = iter->findTag("charged"); break;
170  }
171  if (pair == iter->end())
172  return mp_xml->end();
173 
174  iter = pair->findTag(kind);
175  if (iter != pair->end())
176  return iter;
177 
178  return mp_xml->end();
179 }
180 
181 
182 //==============================================================================
183 
184 SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> CollisionPair::loadIntegral(const string& kind)
185 {
186  IO::XmlElement::const_iterator iter =
187  findXmlElementWithIntegralType(kind);
188 
189  if (iter == mp_xml->end()) {
190  throw Mutation::MissingDataError()
191  << "Collision integral " << kind << " is not given for the pair "
192  << name() << '.';
193  }
194 
195  return CollisionIntegral::load(CollisionIntegral::ARGS(*iter, *this, kind));
196 }
